Faculty.FacultyName: Faculty of Mathematical and Physical Sciences

ModuleInstance.ModuleInstanceDescription: This module represents the year spend abroad by students following the MSci Statistical Science (International Programme). Whilst on the year abroad, students will take courses at the host institution relevant to their field of study. Students should discuss these course choices with the Study Abroad Tutor, who must approve them. Course delivery methods and assessment will be determined by the host institution. The marks awarded by the host institution will then be converted to a single UCL equivalent mark and entered as the result for this module, for the purpose of degree classification.
ModuleInstance.ModuleInstanceRestriction:
This module is only available to students registered on the following degree programmes:

MSci Statistical Science (International Programme)
